title: EP. - 198 - BEHIND THE SCENES OF SIMPLE LIFE
description:
Brad Johnson is a producer and former television executive. He talks about developing several reality television hits including The Simple Life on Fox. The series aired from December 2, 2003 to August 5, 2007and depicted two wealthy socialites, Paris Hilton and Nicole Richie as they struggled to do manual, low-paying jobs such as cleaning rooms, farm work, serving meals in fast-food restaurants, and working as camp counselors.


Natalie and Kathleen from Say Bible podcast review this week’s episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians and what happens at the secret Sunday services. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey 

Patron: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
